ygData.subject: Re: Guild Meeting in Chat on Wednesday
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey David, I have an idea for an IC guild concept.  Our guild could be a multi-racial multi-class guild.  I.E. DE Necros, and Troll SKs working with Paladins
ygData.messageBody:
Hey David,

I have an idea for an IC guild concept. Our guild could be a
multi-racial multi-class guild. I.E. DE Necros, and Troll SKs working
with Paladins and Druids. The guild would not ask that evil people be
good, or good people be evil, but it would require that all guild members
cooperate and be honorable to eachother. This would also fit in with the
name Unity. This is kind of a wacky concept, but I thought I'd throw it
out 8)

9:30pm Wednesday EST sounds good to me. I may be a little late, but I'll
be there.

- Christina

On Mon, 26 Jul 1999, David Lari wrote:

> From: David Lari <kerik@...>
>
> Okay, I'll be the guild master.
>
> I haven't heard any negative comments about the name 'Unity', so I think that will
> be the name unless someone else has something better. So, let's make plans for this
> Wednesday to meet in chat.
>
> I will make the channel 'Unity' and the password will be 'rainbow' in all lower case
> (and case does matter.) If you have any trouble getting into the chat room, just
> contact me directly, my chat name is Lari.
>
> Now we need a time to get 10 people all together at once. I am in Eastern Daylight
> Time. I can be on as early as 4:30pm EDT, and as late as 10:30pm EDT. If we shoot
> for early in that window, we can get some of our European members on, but will miss
> the US Pacific time people who may still be at work. Let's tentatively set it for
> 9:30pm EDT, this Wednesday. Please let me know if you will be able to attend the
> chat at that time. If you cannot, then please tell me a time when you can, in case I
> have to reschedule.
>
> We will work first to create the guild on Brell Serilis, and then spread it to other
> servers fairly quickly.
>
> I would also suggest we need to describe the guild in OOC and IC terms. OOC it will
> be a guild that is open to tolerant, fair-minded people who are GLBT or affirming.
> But what do we want it to be 'in character'. I'd suggest that it certainly not
> discriminate at all based on race or class. Also, do we want to promote RPing, or
> just encourage it, or not bother with it? Or do we just want a guild to provide help
> and friendship to our sister and brother guild mates (such as selling banded armor
> at a steep discount and things like that?)
>
> If anyone has any better ideas or plans, please share them.
>
> Dedric of Ak'anon
> Gnome Necromancer of the 5th circle of life.
> Brell Serilis
>
>
> --------------------------- ONElist Sponsor ----------------------------
>
> Having difficulty getting "in synch" with list members?
